org.nd4j.linalg.jcublas

Class CublasPointer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.nd4j.linalg.jcublas.CublasPointer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable

    public class CublasPointer
extends Object
implements AutoCloseable
    Wraps the allocation and freeing of resources on a cuda device
    Author:
    bam4d

        Parameters:
        buffer -

      • CublasPointer

        public CublasPointer(INDArray array,
                     CudaContext context)
        Creates a CublasPointer for a given INDArray. This wrapper makes sure that the INDArray offset, stride and memory pointers are accurate to the data being copied to and from the device. If the copyToHost function is used in in this class, the host buffer offset and data length is taken care of automatically
        Parameters:
        array -

      • isResultPointer

        public boolean isResultPointer()
        Whether this is a result pointer or not A result pointer means that this pointer should not automatically be freed but instead wait for results to accumulate so they can be returned from the gpu first
